definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: The sound of valves is inherently superior to that of any kind of semi-conductor.
sentences.chinese: 真空管的声音比任何其他种类的半导体都要优越。

sentences.english: It's a small plastic bucket with a crotch cup and a vacuum.
sentences.chinese: 它是一个小的塑料桶状空间，有便池和真空管。

sentences.english: There were computers before the transistor; they used vacuum tubes as logic elements.
sentences.chinese: 在晶体管发明前，计算机采用真空管作为逻辑原件。

sentences.english: Vacuum rectifiers are characterized by the following.
sentences.chinese: 真空管整流器具有如下的特性。

sentences.english: No vacuum or picture tubes were broken .
sentences.chinese: 真空管或显影管都未破碎。

sentences.english: In semiconductor receivers transistors take the place of vacuum tubes.
sentences.chinese: 在半导体收音机中晶体管代替了真空管。

sentences.english: According to the company, the large and heavy vacuum tube-based traveling wave tube amplifiers cannot be effectively replaced by GaAs transistors because they a much lower breakdown voltage
sentences.chinese: 根据公司的消息，真空管将不会被砷化镓晶体管取代。

sentences.english: The feasibility of ETT (Evacuated Tube Transportation)has been verified by foreign and domestic experts.
sentences.chinese: 真空管道运输的可行性已经得到国内外专家的论证。

sentences.english: Shockley, it displaced the vacuum tube in many applications.
sentences.chinese: 晶体管在许多用途上已取代了真空管。

sentences.english: This is a Fleming diode from 1889, if it's original.
sentences.chinese: 这是1889年的两极真空管，是原作。

sentences.english: Showing a group of guests around his collection, Burman takes out one of his prized valves.
sentences.chinese: 带著访客参观他的收藏，玻门拿出一个珍贵的真空管。

sentences.english: To make a more powerful computer meant that you had to have more vacuum tubes.
sentences.chinese: 要制造更高性能的计算机就意味着你需要更多真空管。

sentences.english: Heavy metal guitar players use vacuum tube amplifiers to produce extreme distortion.
sentences.chinese: 重金属吉他手使用真空管放大器造成严重失音。

definition: radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)
rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)
